name: Darkest Forest
description:
Derived from Chinese sci-fi trilogy The Three Body Problem

As a Watcher from one of the most advanced civilization in the Galaxy, your job is to watch the whole galaxy, and see if there's any primal civilization that exposes or have their location(or even existence) exposed.

This is a relatively low status job, because your job may be accomplished by other Watchers, or even Watchers from other advanced civilizations. So you don't need to feel too stressed either.

Right Click to rotate camera

Left Click to shoot light speed particle that can destroy a star
